Package org.gbif.ws.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GbifAppAuthService
    The GBIF authentication scheme is modelled after the Amazon scheme on how to sign REST http requests using a private key.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotAllowedException
    HTTP 403 jersey exception when a request has a valid authentication, but the authenticated user is not allowed to execute the resource.
    NotAuthenticatedException
    HTTP 401 jersey exception when a request requires a valid authentication.
